name: Zombie Loop
description:
Giant hordes of zombies full with a lot of blood, action, and shots  :)

🧟‍♂️Zombie Loops is a game that you can play at any time because is offline and full of zombies and blood where you face infinite enemy waves.

🔫 You will be able to use different weapons, powers and characters to kill the zombies that you can buy and upgrade in the shop and the map.

🪓 Your objective is to get the highest score of all players where you have to upgrade your character, kill a lot of zombies and survive the longest you can.
